about_the_game:
Karting Superstars is a charming racing game that captures the exciting and competitive world of karting. Inspired to condense the thrill and beauty of racing, we've dedicated our love, time, and craft into this new game that builds on the celebrated taste of Circuit Superstars.


Compete across a variety of game modes, from single player experiences VS a dynamic AI that adjusts its difficulty to your skill, to online multiplayer races with friends or players around the globe. Master your racing line and learn to leverage drafting to leave your opponents in the dust.



What Karting Superstars offers

  • Tactile physics model that feels accessible while presenting a high-skill ceiling for you to explore.
  • Kart & driver customization to look absolutely incredible on the race track.
  • Race against up to 12 players from around the globe in online multiplayer, currently we don't have collisions on, but we are working on it!
  • 6 tracks and 16 different layouts.
  • Practice and score your best times across a variety of tracks in Time Trials. Put your name on global leaderboards and drive with the ghosts of your friends or the world's best.
  • Compete against a dynamic AI difficulty that can grow with you. The sky is not even the limit!
  • Compete with AI drivers in race events and tournaments of your own design in Kartcore mode.
  • Race versus global ghosts that let you see how players around the world are tackling each track. You can also learn your friends best tactics!
  • Re-watch your races, see your epic overtakes or study your racing lines and those of your opponents using Replays.
  • Use replay cameras to watch your races from different angles and record epic moments to share.

What Karting Superstars doesn't offer

  • Split screen multiplayer
  • Ability to spectate live races
  • A career mode
  • Multiple types of karts
  • Kart performance upgrades


Original Fire Games (OFG) is a small team based in Canada. OFG is on a mission to become a leader in the racing genre, making games that condense the thrill and beauty of racing to delight players everywhere!

  • Kart & driver customization to look absolutely incredible on the race track.
  • Race against up to 12 players from around the globe in online multiplayer, currently we don't have collisions on, but we are working on it!
  • 6 tracks and 16 different layouts.
  • Practice and score your best times across a variety of tracks in Time Trials. Put your name on global leaderboards and drive with the ghosts of your friends or the world's best.

  • A career mode

  • Kart performance upgrades

name: Karting Superstars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10, or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A kart racing game without weapons! This is a pure motorsport arcade racer. Compete vs very challenging AI, get on the global leaderboards and play with others online.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
